item.title: Notes from CodeCraft 06.08.19: Juju and Application Modelling
item.description: Tim Penhey – lecture for 3rd year info sci Juju and Application Modelling Self-contained applications. devops Not just writing code, deploying Also, monitoring, upgrading. Not just automation Operating is a task in itself. Everything you do with softwrae beyond installing it. Software is complicated most of the time adding code. django gunicorn (Green Unicorn) Python Web Server Gateway Interface (WSGI) HTTP server. It is a pre-fork worker model, ported from Ruby's Unicorn project.
